body.p:
House Reps
Frankfort Mar 27, 1861
His Excellency the Governor of Kentucky
The enclosed petition is worthy of your consideration and ^is^ a meritorious case and if the facts warrant and interference by Executive Clemency it will be thankfully recd by the Petitioner
